price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒߠߋ ߞߊ߫ ߝߌ߬ߛߴߊ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߓߊ ߌ ߞߊ߬ ߒߠߋ ߘߊ߲߫ ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߋ߬ ߘߊ߲߫ ߓߐ߱ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla anā khayrun min'hu khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīnin
